Key Match Events: Zack Gelof homered early in the game.
Max Schuemann and Nick Allen drove in runs with 12th-inning bunts.
Jose Altuve hit an RBI double in the 12th inning.
Daz Cameron made a diving catch to rob Jeremy Peña of a hit in the 10th inning.
Jon Singleton hit his first career triple in the 7th inning.
Brent Rooker scored on a sacrifice fly by Shea Langeliers.
Zack Gelof hit his 17th homer of the season.
Post-Match Reflections: Houston manager Joe Espada was disappointed in his team’s defense in the 12th inning.
Joe Espada reflected on the team's effort, stating 'We battled to the end.'
Daz Cameron expressed satisfaction with his diving catch, saying 'It was good knowing it kept us in the game to win it.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Houston's Spencer Arrighetti tied a season high by allowing seven hits with two runs in 6 2/3 innings.
Oakland starter JP Sears allowed four hits and walked two in six scoreless innings.
Bryan Abreu struck out the side in the 11th inning for Houston.
Others: Athletics' RHP Osvaldo Bido was placed on the 15-day injured list with right wrist flexor tendonitis.
Astros' OF Chas McCormick left the game in the middle of the fifth inning with right wrist discomfort.
